pullRequest.title: CMTS-28: Support fetching values by using metadata key resolver

nodes.bodyText: We have already a reflectionCache as an instance field. We could use that one.

I would say that in this case it should be a failure as the only case for this orElse is if the componentModel is not present or found for the declaration. It would mean that they were trying to resolve keys for a component that is not defined in any of the extension models declared for the session :S

commit.message: CMTS-28: Support fetching values by using metadata key resolver
